channel.title: Commands console?
channel.description:
Ok so, when I try to spawn an item such as "::item 995 5000" I get this error. Well, not much of an error.. just wont let me spawn? I get this> "Use the reverse appostrophe (`) key to open the colsole to enter that command, It is usually located under the ESC key".
Ok? Still wont work.. Any ideas on how I can fix the spawning with > "::item" I really need this to work, (only for admins/owners). thanks guys.
if you got skype add me if you can help me "jamesdxn95"

item.title: Commands console?
item.dc:creator: @ratio ratio
item.description:
@ratio wrote:

Mate. I fucking love you. <3
I ave been trying to find out how to spawn for ages now! Thanks so much! Nuff loveeeeeeeeee!<3

Read full topic

item.title: Commands console?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Why not just use the command console and type the commands there?

You don’t need to use :: in the console just hit ` and you are good to go.

Read full topic
